Sentencas: BaZrO3 exhibits excellent proton conductivity and good high-temperature stability.
Titulo: High Temperature Stability of BaZrO3: An Ab Initio Thermodynamic Study

Sentencas: It is therefore a promising electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: High Temperature Stability of BaZrO3: An Ab Initio Thermodynamic Study

Sentencas: The stability of BaZrO3 at high temperatures is generally explained by the low diffusivity of O vacancy.
Titulo: High Temperature Stability of BaZrO3: An Ab Initio Thermodynamic Study

Sentencas: Present first principle density functional theory calculations show that the slow migration of the doubly charged O vacancy at high temperature cannot be solely caused by the ground-state migration energy but by the contribution of phonon excitations to the free migration energy.
Titulo: High Temperature Stability of BaZrO3: An Ab Initio Thermodynamic Study

Sentencas: With increasing temperature, the effective barrier for oxygen vacancy migration increases.
Titulo: High Temperature Stability of BaZrO3: An Ab Initio Thermodynamic Study

Sentencas: At about 1000K, which is the operating temperature of fuel cells, the calculated O vacancy diffusivity is more than one order of magnitude lower than that determined using ground-state migration barrier.
Titulo: High Temperature Stability of BaZrO3: An Ab Initio Thermodynamic Study

Sentencas: The calculated diffusivity data agree well with experimental results from literature.
Titulo: High Temperature Stability of BaZrO3: An Ab Initio Thermodynamic Study

Sentencas: The present work reveals that the high-temperature stability of BaZrO3 is mainly due to the phonon contribution to the free migration energy of the O vacancy.
Titulo: High Temperature Stability of BaZrO3: An Ab Initio Thermodynamic Study
